description: Apply partial sum operator thrice to Catalan numbers.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: Recurrence: n*(n+1)*a(n) = 2*n*(3*n+1)*a(n-1) - (9*n^2+7*n-4)*a(n-2) + 2*(n+1)*(2*n+1)*a(n-3). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 07 2012a(n) ~ 2^(2*n+6)/(27*sqrt(Pi)*n^(3/2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 07 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
